hero.name: Androshchuk Mykhailo
hero.title: Front-End Developer with experience in React, TypeScript and modern web technologies

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passion for creating exceptional digital experiences
about.paragraph1: Motivated and work-ready Front-End developer with a solid understanding of modern web technologies, including HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, and TypeScript. Open to learning new tools and approaches, quickly adapting to team workflows and tasks.
about.paragraph2: Aspiring to participate in real projects, develop new components, and grow as a developer by solving practical challenges. Focused on creating useful, accessible, and user-friendly interfaces that make a difference.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subtitle: Key projects I have worked on

playsport.title: PlaySport - Sports Platform
playsport.description: Sports platform for booking sports facilities with interactive map, payment system and training management.
highlights: Fixed QA bugs related to styles and mobile display
Created a page for viewing past training sessions
Developed reusable components: confirm dialog, dateRangeSelector, filter, search
Created a page for viewing payments
Added the ability to switch between Google Maps and Leaflet Maps using factory pattern
